welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Indian Harbour Beach, a coastal gem known for its charming atmosphere and beautiful beaches. We invite you to soak up the sun, explore our charming town, and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Melbourne International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is the primary terminal for domestic flights, with a variety of amenities and services available.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 serves international flights and offers duty-free shopping and other international amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merritt Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Merritt Island Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
